sql: SELECT c.CategoryName AS category, SUM(od.Quantity) AS quantity FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN "2017-06-01" AND "2017-06-30" GROUP BY c.CategoryID ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 1
explanation: Combined documents and SQL. 1 SQL rows.

sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) / COUNT(DISTINCT o.OrderID), 2) AS value FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID WHERE o.OrderDate BETWEEN "2017-12-01" AND "2017-12-31"
explanation: Combined documents and SQL. 1 SQL rows.

sql: SELECT p.ProductName AS product, ROUND(SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)), 2) AS revenue FROM "Order Details" od JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID GROUP BY p.ProductID ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 3
explanation: Answered via database query. 3 SQL rows.

sql: SELECT ROUND(SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)), 2) AS revenue FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE c.CategoryName = "Beverages" AND o.OrderDate BETWEEN "2017-06-01" AND "2017-06-30"
explanation: Combined documents and SQL. 1 SQL rows.

sql: SELECT c.CompanyName AS customer, ROUND(SUM((od.UnitPrice - (od.UnitPrice * 0.7)) * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)), 2) AS margin FROM Orders o JOIN "Order Details" od ON o.OrderID = od.OrderID JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE strftime("%Y", o.OrderDate) = "2017" GROUP BY c.CustomerID ORDER BY margin DESC LIMIT 1
explanation: Answered via database query. 1 SQL rows.
